name: Aktau International Airport JSC
about: The Aviation Training Center (ATC) at Aktau International Airport JSC is a dedicated facility for aviation training, offering programs in aviation security, ground operations, and the safe transportation of dangerous goods by air. As a structural unit of the airport, ATC provides comprehensive training both on-site and through mobile instructors. Upon successful completion, students receive certified certificates. The center is committed to maintaining high standards of training, ensuring compliance with international aviation regulations, and enhancing the skills of aviation professionals in Kazakhstan. The ATC plays a crucial role in developing the aviation industry in the region, ensuring safety and efficiency in all aspects of air operations.
services: ["Initial training and maintenance of the professional level of the Ramp Service\nInitial training and maintaining professional level in the course “Safe transportation of dangerous goods by air”"]
